name: Walk To Beach or City 2 - Spacious Room
neighborhood_overview: This neighborhood is perfect for the all ages and lifestyles. We have access to bars, restaurants, museums, the beach, major highways and train stations all within walking distance.  We are located on a quiet street in the middle of everything.  There are also convenient stores, bars, and restaurants located on the same block.
description:
Spacious room located on a quiet one way st. Walking distance to the beach, restaurants. Within minutes of all museums, colleges, bars, & historic landmarks (all between 1-2 miles.) Access all forms of public transportation & major highways in minutes. Street parking available for free but sometimes hard to get a spot .

The space
Large carpeted room located on the third floor of our home. There is a king size bed, a couch which turns into a bed with space for a total of 5 people to sleep. Free wi-fi, an iron, blow dryer. There is no kitchen available.

Guest access
You will have access to the main hall, bedroom, shared bathroom (with Airbnb guests only) located in the hallway and the common fridge, microwave and toaster located in the hall outside the room.

Other things to note
Should you choose to stay with us please have a fully complete profile and valid ID. If you’re local to the Greater Boston area, please do no

name: Walk To The Beach or City, Room 3
neighborhood_overview: This property is located on a quiet one way street . Parking is very hard to find on our street!
description:
Private room and bathroom! There is a king bed that sleeps 3 and a full pull out sofa that sleeps 2. Walk to the beach and restaurants and within minutes of downtown, the museums, colleges and major historic sights.

The space
1925 3 story home. Quiet one way st. walking distance to the beach, restaurants, museums, colleges, bars, & historic landmarks. Access all forms of public transportation & major highways in minutes. Street parking available for free from 8pm to 10am but sometimes hard to get a spot .

Guest access
You will have access to the main hall, kitchen, and private bathroom. The common fridge, microwave and toaster located in the kitchen.

Other things to note
Should you choose to stay with us please have a fully complete profile and valid ID. If you’re local to the Greater Boston area, please do not autobook and reach out to us and let us know the reason for your stay.
